channel.title: dsadd on PetterTech
channel.description: Recent content in dsadd on PetterTech

item.title: Mass import of users in Active Directory
item.description: Tried sleeping……That obviously didn’t work out, so here’s a guide on how to import a number of users in Active Directory and then creating and sharing out their home folder. Note: This guide uses dsadd for creating users and cacls for setting ntfs permissions. Thats kind of old fashioned, I will try to write a new guide using powershell later on. In the scenario I have created this script for we have a domain controller who happens to also be the file server, file01.
